resources.string:
Unable to login to Spotify?
Try logging out of the Spotify app.


Playlist transfer not working?
Try refreshing your login token by clicking login again.


Not able to find files to import?
Make sure the files are located in the "root/Playlist Transfer/Import" folder.


How do I format the files to import?
They need to be a ".txt" file formatted as "Artist - Song Name"


Where are playlist .txt files saved to?
Check the "root/Playlist Transfer/Export" folder.
